attributes.action: Recommend to the Queen that she confer a knighthood on Ringo Starr.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It speaks for itself really. The Beatles are still the most important band in music history and helped to change the face of modern culture. Their music has brought immense pleasure to so many, and still does to this day. Surely the one surviving member who hasn't been knghted, should be.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
